Package test.java.warzone.entities

Class PlayerTest

java.lang.Object
test.java.warzone.entities.PlayerTest
public class PlayerTest extends Object
Unit tests for the Player class. This test suite verifies the functionality of player management, including name management and owned country IDs management.
Version:
2.0.0
